Header.title: Hostel Management System
Header.paragraph: Best Hostel Management System for Admin as well as Users/Students.

About.paragraph: PHMS offers an advanced Hostel Management system for paperless hostel management operations. It covers many important aspects of hostel management. We're working to solve day to day communication, operational, learning and management issues through very much organised and effective solutions by providing many of the important features on Hostel Management website which brings a lot of convenience and efficiency. Students can be provided hostel accommodation based on the availability of rooms. When recording hostel details, custom fields can be added to record any additional information required by the institution. In our Hostel Management System, if the management wants to assign a different price for 2 seaters room or 3 seaters room or more. Yes, here we give such option too.
